dictionary.description: This subspecies of Metal God is said to hold within its massive body an enormous collection of information on the known world. Despite its shiny blue body leading many to think it's as cold as ice, it's really not that bad once you touch one. They also seem to like the look on peoples' faces when they realize this so they often call out to be touched. Though thanks to their rarity, when one says "Try and touch me," Summoners are quick to oblige.
dictionary.summon:
Do I look cold to you?
Hehe, try and touch me!
Come on! Touch me!
